pullRequest.title: Fix ContainerExecDecoratorTest#testCommandExecution
pullRequest.bodyText:
It was failing because in the kind test environment, it can take more than 10
seconds for the process to complete due to the parallel threads due to
resource constraints.
Split from #686

commit.message:
Fix ContainerExecDecoratorTest#testCommandExecution

It was failing because in the kind test environment, it can take more than 10
seconds for the process to complete due to the parallel threads due to
resource constraints.
Review from jesse: remove join with timeout, instead set a global test timeout
